entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Maple Plains
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:24 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Plains 04:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: ESE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening and ending before morning then 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
